nodes.text: Barden Golah was a Human captain of the Imperial Reclamation Service, who was leading an expedition on Tatooine along with Darth Silthar to find an artifact in a Czerka dig site taken over by a mad Rakata named the Imprisoned One. He previously ran expeditions on Ziost, Malachor II and Nim Drovis.

Golah was later promoted to the rank of colonel and sent to investigate the Dantooine Jedi Enclave, where he encountered the Commander, Arn Peralun, and Aryn Leneer. Despite being defeated by the Commander's party, he escaped the encounter after Darth Malgus interrupted the battle with his trap.
